summary: I NOTICED THAT THE WINDSHIELD WAS FOGGED, AND THE DEFROSTER WOULD NOT CLEAR THE FOG.  BLAMED IT ON THE HUMID FLORIDA WEATHER UNTIL ONE EVENING I WAS DRIVING HOME FROM WORK AND ALL OF MY WINDOWS WERE FOGGED.  HAD TO KEEP WIPING THE WINDOWS WITH MY HAND IN ORDER TO SEE OUT THE WINDOW.  TOOK THE CAR TO TO BE CHECKED, AND IT WAS THE HEATER CORE.  THIS CAR IS TOO NEW FOR THE HEATER CORE TO HAVE GONE BAD.  *NM
